description: This table contains the refund address entered on the Refund Request Slip form. Use this table in conjunction with ARPB_TX_REFUND to display the full address entered on the Refund Request Slip form.

columns.name: TX_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier for the transaction record.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this record. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this record.

columns.name: REFUND_ADDR_ADDRESS
columns.description: This column contains the refund address entered on the Refund Request Slip form.
